ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dstfrv.1 | |- ( ph -> P e. Prob ) |
| 2 |  | dstfrv.2 | |- ( ph -> X e. ( rRndVar ` P ) ) |
| 3 |  | orvclteel.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) |
| 4 |  | dstfrvel.1 | |- ( ph -> B e. U. dom P ) |
| 5 |  | dstfrvel.2 | |- ( ph -> ( X ` B ) <_ A ) |
| 6 | 1, 2 | #P_rrvvf | |- ( ph -> X : U. dom P --> RR ) |
| 7 | 6, 4 | #P_ffvelrnd | |- ( ph -> ( X ` B ) e. RR ) |
| 8 |  | #P_breq1 | |- ( x = ( X ` B ) -> ( x <_ A <-> ( X ` B ) <_ A ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_elrab | |- ( ( X ` B ) e. { x e. RR | x <_ A } <-> ( ( X ` B ) e. RR /\ ( X ` B ) <_ A ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 5, 9 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ph -> ( X ` B ) e. { x e. RR | x <_ A } ) |
| 11 |  | #P_ffun | |- ( X : U. dom P --> RR -> Fun X ) |
| 12 | 6, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> Fun X ) |
| 13 | 1, 2 | #P_rrvdm | |- ( ph -> dom X = U. dom P ) |
| 14 | 4, 13 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ph -> B e. dom X ) |
| 15 |  | #P_fvimacnv | |- ( ( Fun X /\ B e. dom X ) -> ( ( X ` B ) e. { x e. RR | x <_ A } <-> B e. ( `' X " { x e. RR | x <_ A } ) ) ) |
| 16 | 12, 14, 15 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( X ` B ) e. { x e. RR | x <_ A } <-> B e. ( `' X " { x e. RR | x <_ A } ) ) ) |
| 17 | 10, 16 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> B e. ( `' X " { x e. RR | x <_ A } ) ) |
| 18 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_orrvcval4 | |- ( ph -> ( X oRVC <_ A ) = ( `' X " { x e. RR | x <_ A } ) ) |
| 19 | 17, 18 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ph -> B e. ( X oRVC <_ A ) ) |
